caption.p: Pediatric hospitalizations for LRTI and RSV according to age, 2008â€“1010. A. Pediatric lower respiratory tract infection (LRTI) hospitalizations. Infants <1 year of age accounted for 47 % of LRTI hospitalizations among all children B. Pediatric respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) specific hospitalizations. Infants <1 year of age accounted for 77% RSV-specific LRTI hospitalizations among all children.
